subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: In addition to the Arc de Triomphe race, there are six other Group 1 races on the card at Longchamp on Sunday, meaning that race-goers will see champions at every distance.
snippet: In addition to the Arc de Triomphe race, there are six other Group 1 races on the card at Longchamp on Sunday, meaning that race-goers will see champions at every distance.
